docs.title: 歡迎來到 Pocketx SDK Documentation！
docs.text: 準備好開始你的金融科技之旅了嗎？

docs.title: 什麼是 Pocketx？
docs.text: PocketxSDK 是用C#語言開發的應用程式介面，提供投資者在台灣和全球金融市場上進行交易。

docs.title: 目前提供的程式語言
docs.text:
• Python
  • C#

docs.title: 支持作業系統
docs.text: • Windows11

docs.title: 快速開始
docs.text:
• 快速開始
  • 事前準備

準備好了嗎？讓我們開始這段精彩的程式設計之旅！ ✨

docs.title: Prepare
docs.text: 目前尚未開放給一般人註冊使用 ！！！

docs.title: Index
docs.text: Hello this is QA !

docs.title: 登入啟用並憑證
docs.text:
Input

using PocketxSDK;

var pocketx = new Pocketx();
var _accounts = pocketx.Login("YOUR_API_KEY", "YOUR_SECRET_KEY");
var flag = pocketx.ca_activate("<你的pfx路徑>", "<你的 personal_id>", "<你的 personal_id>");
Console.WriteLine(_accounts);

docs.title: 下單
docs.text:
Input

var order = new StockOrder()
{
    price = <price>,
    quantity = <qty>,
    action = Action.Buy,
    price_type = StockPriceType.LMT,
    order_type = OrderType.ROD,
    order_lot = orderLot,
    daytrade_short = DayTradeShort.No,
    custom_field = "Test",
};
var trade = pocketx.PlaceOrder(contract, order);

docs.title: Index
docs.text: Hello release-note !

docs.title: 銀行餘額
docs.text:
用於查詢現貨交割帳戶餘額，需要先登入。

Input

var res = pocketx.AccountBalance();
Console.WriteLine($"accountBalance: {res}");

Output

accountBalance: accountBalance: {"acc_balance":0.0,"date":"xx/xx/2025 05:59:26","errmsg":""}

Attribute

acc_balance (float): 餘額,
date (str): 查詢日期,
errmsg (str): 錯誤訊息

docs.title: 未實現損益
docs.text:
用於查詢未實現損益，需要先登入。

Input

var res = pocketx.ListPositions(pocketx.StockAccount);
Console.WriteLine($"Positions: {res}")

Output

Positions: [
    {
        "yd_quantity": 20000,
        "cond": 0,
        "margin_purchase_amount": 0,
        "collateral": 0,
        "short_sale_margin": 0,
        "interest": 0,
        "id": 0,
        "code": "2337",
        "direction": "Buy",
        "quantity": 22000,
        "price": 25.79,
        "last_price": 34.65,
        "pnl": 192212.0
    },
    {
        "yd_quantity": 2000,
        "cond": 0,
        "margin_purchase_amount": 0,
        "collateral": 0,
        "short_sale_margin": 0,
        "interest": 0,
        "id": 1,
        "code": "4953",
        "direction": "Sell",
        "quantity": 0,
        "price": 0.0,
        "last_price": 122.5,
        "pnl": 0.0
    }
]

Attribute

yd_quantity (int): 昨日庫存數量
cond (StockOrderCond): {
        Cash: 現股(預設值), 
        Netting: 餘額交割,
        MarginTrading: 融資, 
        ShortSelling: 融券, 
        Emerging: 興櫃
    }
margin_purchase_amount (int):  融資金額
collateral (int): 擔保品
short_sale_margin (int): 保證金
interest (int): 除息
id (int): 部位代碼
code (str):商品代碼
direction (str): {Buy: 買, Sell: 賣}
quantity (int): 數量,
price (float): 平均價格,
last_price (float): 目前股價,
pnl (float): 損益

docs.title: 已實現損益
docs.text:
用於查詢已實現損益，需要先登入。

Input

var res = pocketx.ListProfitLoss(begin_date, end_date, pocketx.StockAccount);
Console.WriteLine($"ProfitLoss: {res}")

Output

ProfitLoss: {"9802269":[{"seqno":"5540359","dseq":"CO180","price":"123","pr_ratio":"-4.06","cond":"0","id":"0","code":"4953","quantity":"2000","pnl":"-10380","date":"20251030"},{"seqno":"5540359","dseq":"CJ239","price":"115","pr_ratio":"3.24","cond":"0","id":"1","code":"3029","quantity":"1000","pnl":"3592","date":"20251009"}]}

Attribute

seqno (string): seqno no.
dseq (string): seqno no.
price (decimal): 價格
pr_ratio (decimal): 損益比
cond (StockOrderCond): {
            Cash: 現股(預設值)
            Netting: 餘額交
            MarginTrading: 融資
            ShortSelling: 融券
            Emerging: 興櫃
        }
"id": 可利用此id查詢明細
"code": 商品代碼
quantity (int): 數量
pnl (fldecimaloat): 損益
date (string): 交易日期

docs.title: 交割款
docs.text:
用於查詢交割款，需要先登入。

Input

var res = pocketx.Settlements();
Console.WriteLine($"settlements: {res}")

Output

Settlements: [{"ddate":"20251030","amount":"0","tdate":0},{"ddate":"20251031","amount":"0","tdate":1},{"ddate":"20251103","amount":"175873","tdate":2}]

Attribute

ddate (str):交割日期
amount (str): 交割金額,
tdate (str): Tday

docs.title: Hello advance-guide
docs.text: 目前尚未提供此功能 ！！！

docs.title: 委託回報
docs.text: 每次使用 PlaceOrder、UpdateOrder 或者 CancelOrder 時，皆會收到來自交易所的委託或成交回報。

docs.title: 處理委託及成交回報
docs.text:
Input

static public void MyCallBackFunction(OrderState orderState, dynamic msg)
{
    Console.WriteLine("my_order_callback");
    Console.WriteLine($"OrderState.{orderState} - {msg}");
}

pocketx.SetOrderCallback((orderState, msg) => {
    Console.WriteLine($"訂單狀態變更: {orderState} - {msg}");
});

Output

[2025-10-30 14:38:43][INF][SYSTEM] Set Order Callback Successfully!!!

docs.title: 委託回報
docs.text:
Success

OrderState.StockOrder - {
    "stat": "SORDER",
    "msg": {
        "operation": {
            "op_type": "Cancel",
            "op_code": "",
            "op_msg": ""
        },
        "order": {
            "id": "",
            "seqno": 355251,
            "ordno": "CP354",
            "account": "<your-account-ino>",
            "action": "Buy",
            "price": "56.0",
            "quantity": "5",
            "order_type": "ROD",
            "price_type": "LMT",
            "order_cond": "Cash",
            "order_lot": "Common",
            "custom_field": "Test"
        },
        "status": {
            "id": "",
            "exchange_ts": "113842123",
            "modified_price": "56.0",
            "cancel_quantity": "1000",
            "order_quantity": "0",
            "web_id": ""
        },
        "contract": {
            "security_type": "STK",
            "exchange": "TSE",
            "code": "0050",
            "symbol": "TSE0050",
            "name": "元大台灣50",
            "currency": "TWD"
        }
    }
}

docs.title: 成交回報
docs.text:
Success

...

docs.title: 商品檔
docs.text: 商品檔將在很多地方被使用，例如下單、訂閱行情...等。

docs.title: 取得商品檔
docs.text: 當登入成功後，會開始下載商品檔。

docs.title: 商品檔資訊
docs.text:
目前我們所提供的商品只有證券 (未來會提供更多交易商品)。可從下列方法更詳細得到我們所提供的商品。

Input

using PocketxSDK;

var pocketx = new Pocketx();
var contract = pocketx.Contracts;
Console.WriteLine(_contract);

Output

{
    "Indexs":{},"Stocks":{"OTC":{"006201":{"security_type":"STK","code":"006201","symbol":"OTC006201","exchange":"OTC","limit_up":26.57,"limit_down":21.75,"reference":0.0,"margin_trading_balance":0,"short_selling_balance":0,"update_date":"2024/07/19","category":"00","day_trade":2,"name":"元大富櫃50","target_code":""}, .... }}
}

docs.title: 證券
docs.text:
Input

var contract_0050 = _api.Contracts.Stocks["TSE"]["0050"];
Console.WriteLine(contract_0050.ToString());

Out:

{
    "security_type":"STK",
    "code":"0050",
    "symbol":"TSE0050",
    "exchange":"TSE",
    "limit_up":209.65,
    "limit_down":171.55,
    "reference":0.0,
    "margin_trading_balance":0,
    "short_selling_balance":0,
    "update_date":"2024/07/19",
    "day_trade":2,
    "category":"00",
    "name":"元大台灣50",
    "target_code":"",
}

Attribute

code (str): 商品代碼
symbol (str): 符號
exchange (Exchange): 交易所 {OES, OTC, TSE ...等}
limit_up (float): 漲停價
limit_down (float): 跌停價
name (str): 商品名稱
reference (float): 參考價
margin_trading_balance (int): 融資餘額
short_selling_balance (int): 融券餘額
update_date (str): 更新日期
day_trade (DayTrade): 可否當沖 {Yes, No, OnlyBuy}
category (str): 類別
name (str): 名稱

docs.title: Login
docs.text:
登入必須擁有口袋帳戶。若你還沒有擁口袋帳戶，可詳見 口袋開戶

Input

using PocketxSDK;

var pocketx = new Pocketx();
var _accounts = pocketx.Login("YOUR_API_KEY", "YOUR_SECRET_KEY");
var flag = pocketx.ca_activate("<你的pfx路徑>", "<你的 personal_id>", "<你的 personal_id>");
Console.WriteLine(_accounts);

Output

[2025-xx-xx 13:59:21][INF][SYSTEM] Welcome to Pocketx!!!
[2025-xx-xx 13:59:21][INF][SYSTEM] Login...
[2025-xx-xx 13:59:22][INF][SYSTEM] Connecting to PulsarService...
[2025-xx-xx 13:59:22][INF][SYSTEM] Connected to PulsarService Successfully !!!

docs.title: List Accounts
docs.text:
有兩種方式可以獲得你的帳戶資訊

Input

using PocketxSDK;

var pocketx = new Pocketx();
var _accounts = pocketx.Login("YOUR_API_KEY", "YOUR_SECRET_KEY");
Console.WriteLine($"_accounts: {_accounts}");

Input

using PocketxSDK;

var pocketx = new Pocketx();
var listAccounts = ListAccounts(pocketx);
Console.WriteLine(listAccounts);

Output

listAccounts: [
    {"account_type":"...","person_id":"...","broker_id":"...","account_id":"...","signed":true,"username":"..."}
]

docs.title: Logout
docs.text:
Input

using PocketxSDK;

var pocketx = new Pocketx();
var res = _api.Logout();
Console.WriteLine(res);

docs.title: 委託回報
docs.text:
委託回報

OrderState.StockOrder - {
    "stat": "SORDER",
    "msg": {
        "operation": {
            "op_type": "Cancel",
            "op_code": "",
            "op_msg": ""
        },
        "order": {
            "id": "",
            "seqno": 355251,
            "ordno": "CP354",
            "account": "<your-account-info>",
            "action": "Buy",
            "price": "56.0",
            "quantity": "5",
            "order_type": "ROD",
            "price_type": "LMT",
            "order_cond": "Cash",
            "order_lot": "Common",
            "custom_field": "Test"
        },
        "status": {
            "id": "",
            "exchange_ts": "113842123",
            "modified_price": "56.0",
            "cancel_quantity": "1000",
            "order_quantity": "0",
            "web_id": ""
        },
        "contract": {
            "security_type": "STK",
            "exchange": "TSE",
            "code": "0050",
            "symbol": "TSE0050",
            "name": "元大台灣50",
            "currency": "TWD"
        }
    }
}

Attribute

operation

op_type (string): {
        "New": 新單, 
        "Cancel": 刪單,  
        "UpdatePrice": 改價, 
        "UpdateQty": 改量
    }
op_code (string): {"00": 成功, others: 失敗}
op_msg (string): 錯誤訊息

order

id (string): 與成交回報的trade_id相同
seqno (string): 平台單號
ordno (string): 委託單號
account (dict): 帳號資訊
action (string): 買賣別 {Buy, Sell}
price (float or int): 委託價格
quantity (int): 委託數量
order_type (string): 委託類別 {ROD, IOC, FOK}
price_type (string): {LMT: 限價, MKT: 市價, MKP: 範圍市價}
order_cond (string): {
            Cash: 現股, 
            MarginTrading: 融資, 
            ShortSelling: 融券
        }
order_lot (string): {
            Common: 整股, 
            Fixing: 定盤, 
            Odd: 盤後零股, 
            IntradayOdd: 盤中零股
        }
custom_field (string): 自訂欄位

status

id (string): 與成交回報的trade_id相同
exchange_ts (float): 交易所時間
modified_price (float or int): 改價
cancel_quantity (int): 取消數量
order_quantity (int): 委託數量
web_id (string): 下單平台代碼

contract

security_type (string): 商品類別
exchange (string): 交易所
code (string): 商品代碼
symbol (string): 符號
name (string): 商品名稱
currency (string): 幣別

docs.title: 成交回報
docs.text:
成交回報

...

docs.title: 回報處理
docs.text: 詳細可查看，Call back。

docs.title: 查詢狀態
docs.text:
提醒

先執行 UpdateStatus 取得最新 Trade 狀態。 若刪單／改單失敗，請重新更新該 Trade 物件，並檢查 OrderStatus 是否為可取消或可修改的狀態。

docs.title: 取得證券委託狀態
docs.text:
Input

pocketx.UpdateStatus(account, trade);
pocketx.ListTrades();

Output

docs.title: 證券
docs.text:
Warning

下單前，請先進行登入以及激活憑證

docs.title: 證券委託單
docs.text:
Attribute

price (float or int): 價格
quantity (int): 委託數量
action (Action): {Buy: 買, Sell: 賣}
price_type (StockPriceType): {LMT: 限價, MKT: 市價, MKP: 範圍市價}
order_type (OrderType): 委託類別 {ROD, IOC, FOK}
order_cond (StockOrderCond): {Cash:現股, MarginTrading:融資, ShortSelling:融券}(目前只支持Cash)
order_lot (StockOrderLot): {Common:整股, Fixing:定盤, Odd:盤後零股, IntradayOdd:盤中零股}
daytrade_short (DayTradeShort): 現沖 {Yes, No}
account (:obj:Account): 下單帳號  
custom_field (string): 備註
ca (binary): the ca of this order

docs.title: 下單
docs.text:
下單時，請提供 商品檔資訊 以及 下單資訊。

商品檔

var contract = pocketx.Contracts.Stocks["TSE"]["0050"];

Input

var order = new StockOrder()
{
    price = <price>,
    quantity = <qty>,
    action = Action.Buy,
    price_type = StockPriceType.LMT,
    order_type = OrderType.ROD,
    order_lot = orderLot,
    daytrade_short = DayTradeShort.No,
    custom_field = "Test",
};
var trade = pocketx.PlaceOrder(contract, order);

output

    {
    "contract":{
        "security_type":"STK",
        "code":"0050",
        "symbol":"TSE0050",
        "exchange":"TSE",
        "limit_up":70.8,
        "limit_down":58.0,
        "reference":0.0,
        "margin_trading_balance":0,
        "short_selling_balance":0,
        "update_date":"2025/10/31",
        "category":"00",
        "day_trade":"2",
        "name":"元大台灣50",
        "target_code":""
    },
    "order":{
        "action":"Buy",
        "price":60.0,
        "quantity":3,
        "price_type":"LMT",
        "order_type":"ROD",
        "order_lot":"Common",
        "order_cond":"Cash",
        "daytrade_short":0,
        "id":"",
        "seqno":"484614",
        "ordno":"CL561",
        "account":"<your-account_msg>",
        "custom_field":"Test",
        "ca":"..."
    },
    "status":{
        "id":"",
        "status":"Submitted",
        "status_code":"00",
        "order_datetime":"20251031100509",
        "msg":"已處理 9802243 的 0050，價格為 60.0，數量為 3 (整張)",
        "modified_ts":0.0,
        "modified_price":0.0,
        "order_quantity":3000,
        "cancel_quantity":0,
        "act":0,
        "deals":null
    }
}

docs.title: 改價
docs.text:
改價

var updatedTrade = pocketx.UpdateOrder(trade, price: 51.0, quantity: 0);

Note

零股不得改價

output

{
    "contract":{
        "security_type":"STK",
        "code":"0050",
        "symbol":"TSE0050",
        "exchange":"TSE",
        "limit_up":70.8,
        "limit_down":58.0,

        "short_selling_balance":0,
        "update_date":"2025/10/31",
        "category":"00",
        "day_trade":"2",
        "name":"元大台灣50",
        "target_code":""
    },
    "order":{
        "action":"Buy",
        "price":60.0,
        "quantity":3,
        "price_type":"LMT",
        "order_type":"ROD",
        "order_lot":"Common",
        "order_cond":"Cash",
        "daytrade_short":"",
        "id":"",
        "seqno":"484614",
        "ordno":"CL561",
        "account":"<your-account-info>",
        "custom_field":"Test",
        "ca":"..."
        },
    "status":{
        "id":"",
        "status":"Submitted",
        "status_code":"00",
        "order_datetime":"20251031100509",
        "msg":"已處理 9802243 的 0050，價格為 60.0，數量為 3 (整張)",
        "modified_ts":0.0,
        "modified_price":0.0,
        "order_quantity":3000,
        "cancel_quantity":0,
        "act":0,

}

docs.title: 改量(減量)
docs.text:
UpdateOrder 只能用來減少原委託單的委託數量。

改量

var updatedTrade2 = pocketx.UpdateOrder(trade, price: 0, quantity: 2);

docs.title: 刪單
docs.text:
Input

var updatedTrade2 = pocketx.UpdateOrder(trade, price: 0, quantity: 2);

docs.title: 模擬模式
docs.text:
使用者能在模擬環境中進行測試。

Example

var pocketx = new Pocketx(simulation: true);

docs.title: 可使用的APIs
docs.text:
行情資料

  1. Subscribe
  2. UnSubscribe
  3. Ticks

下單

  1. PlaceOrder
  2. UpdateOrder
  3. CancelOrder
  4. UpdateStatus
  5. ListTrades

帳務

  1. ListPositions
  2. ListProfitLoss
